attributes.action: Security officers should get full sick pay
attributes.background: Give security officers full sick pay not statutory sick pay

rejection.details:
The Government is not responsible for setting sick pay for workers it is not directly responsible for employing.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Fund full sick pay for employees that are off work due to COVID: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551962

Increase Statutory Sick Pay (SSP): https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559857

Increase Statutory Sick Pay to £330 per week during COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569262
